data.text: Ensel mamɨd ak, akɨl ne ak pugek, gap wɨsɨp alaŋ nɨb pɨgju lum awl owak olap nop nɨgɨnek. Pen nop ki olap kaw mɨgan kɨluŋ ma tɨkak ak ñɨlak.
9.2 Stt 19.28, Kis 19.18, Jol 2.2, 2.10 Ñelak, kaw kanɨbtub ak yɨkek, sɨkom awl yɨbɨl ak aplanɨl, sub ak sek, wɨsɨp alaŋ sek gek yu gɨl, kɨsɨlɨm owak.
9.3 Kis 10.4, 10.12-15, Het 7.12, Lep 9.10 Anɨgek, joŋ gɨlobɨd okok, sɨkom nab anɨb okok nɨb gɨ dam lum ayaŋ lɨl, meg gaw awl okok gɨpal tek gɨnɨg gelak.

9.4 Ese 9.4, Lep 6.6, 7.3 Gɨlobɨd anɨb okok kɨlop agak, Mɨj wɨj mab wɨj tap tɨtay lum ayaŋ jakɨnɨmuŋ okok, gɨ tɨmel ma gɨnɨmɨb agak. Binɨb kɨli God kɨjɨkɨl nebeŋ kɨlop alaŋ ma mɨdeb okok nep, gɨ tɨmel gɨnɨmɨb agak.

9.5 Lep 9.10, 11.7 Agak anɨb ak, pɨsnep paklem kumnɨgel agɨl ma agak. Yokɨp takan anep mamɨd ak yɨpɨl mab tɨmel ñɨnɨmɨb agɨl agak. Kɨlop yɨpɨl mab tɨmel ñɨnɨgabal anɨb ak, meg gaw awl okok suwel yul gup tek gɨnɨgab.
9.6 Jop 3.21, Ais 2.19, Jer 8.3, Lep 6.16 Ñɨn nab anɨb ak, binɨb anɨb okok kubɨnop agɨl nɨgɨnɨgabal ak pen, kumeb kanɨb tam olap ma yenɨgab.
Joŋ gɨlobɨd anɨb okok, chag hos penpen ñagɨnɨg, tap kɨles lɨpal tek okok lɨ yelak. Kɨmɨg kɨli dum alaŋ nag gol dɨl gɨlak okok tek lak. Jomulɨk kɨli okok, bɨ tek lɨlak.
9.8 Jol 1.6 Kɨmɨg wɨj kɨli okok, bin kɨmɨg wɨj pal ak tek lak. Pen meg kɨli okok, chen layon apal ak meg kɨd tɨmel tek lak.

9.9 Jol 2.5 Pabɨl okok, chech kɨles tɨmel sek kadɨŋ tek lak. Pen joŋ kuŋay yɨbɨl pɨl pakelak, gu awl yɨbɨl agak. Chag hos tap bad lɨpɨg dad ameb okok, kuŋay yɨbɨl lɨpɨg dad penpen ñagɨnɨg amel gigu agup tek okok agak.
Yɨnɨg day ayɨm, meg gaw binɨb suwek yul gup tek ak gak. Takan anep mamɨd ak, binɨb okok kɨlop yɨpɨl mab tɨmel ñɨlɨg yelak.

Tap anɨb okok bɨnonɨm kɨli nɨm, ensel ne sɨŋak kaw mɨgan kɨluŋ ma tɨkak ak kod mɨdeb ak. Hiblu takaw agɨl, ensel anɨb ak yɨb ne Abadon apal. Pen Glik takaw agɨl, yɨb ne Apoliyon apal. Takaw jɨj anɨb ak nɨm, Bɨ olap ne tap okok mɨdupsek gɨ tɨmel yɨbɨl gup.
Anɨb ak mɨŋel awl yɨbɨl ned ak owup, pen nɨgɨm. Kɨdek omɨŋal ownɨgab.

Ensel kagol ak, akɨl ne ak pugek nɨgɨnek, takaw olap owak. Abañ adek gol dɨl gɨlak ak, tap chag mablod tek abañ adek gol omɨŋal lɨl kus gɨlak ak, takaw anɨb ak yɨl owak. Abañ anɨb ak, God wɨdɨn ne sɨŋak yek.
9.14 Lep 16.12 Pen takaw anɨb ak, ensel kagol akɨl dɨ yek anɨb ak nop agak, Ensel omɨŋal omɨŋal tunɨg lel, ñɨg awl Yupletis mɨdebal okok, wɨsɨb yokɨnɨmɨn agak.

9.15 Lep 8.7-12 Agek, ensel anɨb ak ne ensel omɨŋal omɨŋal okok kɨlop wɨsɨb yokak. Taynen? God ne ensel anɨb okok kɨlop ned aglek, sub anɨb ak nep, takan anɨb ak nep, ñɨn anɨb ak nep, won anɨb ak nep kod yelɨgɨpal. Kod yelɨgɨpal ak nɨm, ñɨn anɨb ak apek, binɨb lum awl yelak okok day omɨŋal nokom tek agɨl, day omɨŋal tek yek, day nokom olap ñagɨnɨgel agɨl, wɨsɨb yokak.
9.16 Sng 68.17, Ese 38.4, Dan 7.10 Pen agek nɨgɨnek, Bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep kɨli chag hos adek besɨgɨlak okok kuŋay yɨbɨl nep, 200 milion tek yelak.

Pen day anɨb ak nɨgɨnek, chag hos kɨli okok sek, bɨ hos adek besɨgɨlak okok sek anɨgɨl mɨdebal. Bɨ okok, pabɨl kɨli chech kɨles tɨmel sek kadɨŋ tek lɨlak. Chech anɨb okok, mab mɨŋɨlaŋ nɨkɨm tek gak, muk tek gak, kab pok salpa apal ak tek gak. Chag hos kɨmɨg okok, chen layon kɨmɨg tek lak. Meg mɨgan kɨli alaŋ mab mɨŋɨlaŋ sek, sɨkom sek, kab salpa yuk tɨmel ak sek apɨl gek,

binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl kumɨlak. Binɨb anɨb okok, day omɨŋal nokom tek agɨl, day omɨŋal tek yek, day nokom olap kumɨlak. Tap tɨmel omɨŋal nokom anɨb ak, mab mɨŋɨlaŋ sek, sɨkom sek, kab salpa sek chag hos meg mɨgan kɨli alaŋ apɨl gak.
Chag hos anɨb okok kɨles kɨli ak yek, kɨmɨg day oŋɨd sek, amun day ayɨm sek. Amun kɨli okok, yoy kɨmɨg tek lak ak nɨm, binɨb okok kɨlop gɨ tɨmel gɨlak.

9.20 Lo 31.29, Sng 106.37, 115.4-7, 135.15-17, Ais 2.8, 2.18-20, Dan 5.23, 1 Ko 10.19-20, Lep 16.9-11 Pen tap tɨmel anɨb okok binɨb kuŋay kɨlop paklel kumɨlak. Kumel, binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl yelak okok gak anɨb ak nɨgɨlak ak pen, taynen tap si tap tɨmel gɨpun agɨl nɨŋɨd ma kelɨgɨlak. Pen tap ñɨnen gɨlak ak abe ma kelɨgɨlak. Tap yokɨp wɨdɨn ma nɨŋɨd, tɨmud ma nɨŋɨd, kanɨb ma ajel, gol, silpa, blas, kab, mab dɨl gɨlak okok kɨlop suk agɨnɨgun agɨl ma kelɨgɨlak. Kɨcheki tap okok abe kɨlop nep agnɨg yelak. Ma kelɨgɨlak.
Pen chɨp ñagɨl, kɨyob pakɨl, kuj gɨl, tap si dɨl, bin si bɨ si gel amnaknɨŋ, taynen anɨgɨpun agɨl ma kelɨgɨlak.
